summary: This bill, the United States-Greece Security Cooperation Reporting Act, mandates the Secretary of Defense to submit a report to Congress on the security relationship between the United States and Greece. The report must include details on basing rights under the updated Mutual Defense Cooperation Agreement (MDCA), US activities and investments, necessary investments at Alexandroupolis, potential for expanded military presence, and an assessment of security cooperation mandated by the United States-Greece Defense and Interparliamentary Partnership Act of 2021.
